trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static methods, attached properties, and events for determining and setting focus scopes and for setting the focused element within the scope.
trans-unit.target: 확인 및 포커스 범위를 설정 및 범위 내에서 포커스가 있는 요소를 설정 하기 위한 정적 메서드, 연결 된 속성 및 이벤트 집합을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] there are two concepts concerning focus: keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] 두 가지 개념인 포커스와: 키보드 포커스와 논리 포커스 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus pertains to the element which is currently receiving keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스는 키보드 입력을 받고 현재 요소에 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: There can be only one element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스가 있는 요소는 하나만 있을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This element with keyboard focus has <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스를이 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>키보드 포커스가 있는 요소를 반환합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Logical focus pertains to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 논리적 포커스와 관련 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>특정 포커스 범위 내에서.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위는 컨테이너 요소를 추적 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>해당 범위 내에서.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>클래스는 마찬가지로 포커스 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위를 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: There can be multiple elements with logical focus, but there can only be one element with logical focus within a single focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스를 가진 요소가 여러 개 있을 수 있지만 단일 포커스 범위 내에서 논리적 포커스를 가진 요소가 하나만 존재할 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An element with logical focus does not necessarily have keyboard focus, but an element with keyboard focus will have logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 논리 포커스와 키보드 포커스를가지고 있지 않습니다 되지만 키보드 포커스를 가진 요소가 논리 포커스를 갖게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to define a focus scope within a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위 내에서 포커스가 범위를 정의 하는 것이 불가능 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In this case, both the parent focus scope and the child focus scope can have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 부모 포커스 범위 및 자식 포커스 범위에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 를 가질 수 있습니다이 경우

trans-unit.source: The following scenario illustrates how keyboard focus and logical focus change in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has a <xref:System.Windows.Window> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> which has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 시나리오에서 키보드 포커스와 논리적 포커스 변경 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] 는 <xref:System.Windows.Window> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 가</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window> 있는 응용 프로그램

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus changes from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> losses keyboard focus but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스가 변경 될 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>키보드 포커스를 잃지에 대 한 논리 포커스를 유지 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Window>포커스 범위.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> obtains keyboard focus and obtains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>키보드 활성화 되 고에 대 한 논리적 포커스를 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>포커스 범위.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus returns to the root <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the element in <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope with logical focus will obtain keyboard focus, which in this case is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스 루트 <xref:System.Windows.Window> <xref:System.Windows.Window>포커스 범위 논리적 포커스와 키보드 포커스,이 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> 변수인 가져옵니다</xref:System.Windows.Window> 의 요소를</xref:System.Windows.Window> 반환 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> now has keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>논리 포커스와 키보드 포커스가 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> loses keyboard focus, but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>키보드 포커스를 잃을 대 한 논리적 포커스를 유지 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>포커스 범위.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 기본값 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>에 <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and the [Focus Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 포커스에 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [포커스 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>연결 된 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> 을이 이벤트를 수신 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 이벤트 처리기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 처리기는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>연결 된 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> 을이 이벤트를 수신 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 이벤트 처리기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>연결 된 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element with logical focus within the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 포커스 범위 내에서 논리적 포커스를 가진 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>특정 포커스 범위에 대 한 논리 포커스가 있는 요소입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체가 되거나 키보드 포커스를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스 키보드 입력을 받는 요소를 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스 포커스와 키보드 포커스, 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: If `element` is not a focus scope, this method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `element` 않습니다 포커스 범위가이 메서드는 반환 `null`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, to specify the element with logical focus within a specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, 지정 된 포커스 범위 내에서 논리적 포커스를 가진 요소를 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element with logical focus in the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 포커스 범위에 논리 포커스가 있는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The element in the specified focus scope with logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 포커스 범위 논리 포커스가 있는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: Determines the closest ancestor of the specified element that has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가 지정 된 요소의 가장 가까운 상위 항목을 결정 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>로 설정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 기본값 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>에 <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위는 컨테이너 요소를 추적 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>해당 범위 내에서.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>클래스는 마찬가지로 포커스 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위를 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스 포커스와 키보드 포커스, 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The element to get the closest focus scope for.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 가장 가까운 포커스 범위를 가져올 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 요소에 대 한 포커스 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> is a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> 포커스 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위는 컨테이너 요소를 추적 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>해당 범위 내에서.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>클래스는 마찬가지로 포커스 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위를 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스 포커스와 키보드 포커스, 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the attached property.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 속성을 읽을 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> on the specified element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>로 설정 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 지정 된 요소의; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>연결 된 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>연결 된 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 기본값 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>에 <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>은 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위는 컨테이너 요소를 추적 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>해당 범위 내에서.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>클래스는 마찬가지로 포커스 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위를 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스 포커스와 키보드 포커스, 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>연결 된 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 처리기를 제거는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>연결 된 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> 을이 이벤트를 수신 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기가 제거 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 처리기를 제거는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>연결 된 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> 을이 이벤트를 수신 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기가 제거 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets logical focus on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 요소에 포커스를 논리 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for the specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>특정 포커스 범위에 대 한 논리 포커스가 있는 요소입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체가 되거나 키보드 포커스를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 키보드 포커스 키보드 입력을 받는 요소를 가리킵니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스 포커스와 키보드 포커스, 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify a focus scope that is an ancestor of the focus scope the element is in.
trans-unit.target: 요소가 포커스 범위의 상위 포커스 범위를 지정 하는 것이 불가능 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is a focus scope and its parent <xref:System.Windows.Window> is a focus scope, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> could specify the <xref:System.Windows.Window> as the focus scope when calling SetFocusedElement.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>포커스 범위와 해당 부모는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>포커스 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>의 자식은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>지정할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>SetFocusedElement를 호출할 때 포커스 범위로.</xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is then <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> for both the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>그러면 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A>모두에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>포커스 범위 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>포커스 범위.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: SetFocusedElement will give the specified element logical focus in the specified focus scope and will attempt to give the element keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: SetFocusedElement 지정된 된 포커스 범위에 지정 된 요소가 논리 포커스를 표시 하 고 요소가 키보드 포커스를 시도 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope in which to make the specified element the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement*> 을 포커스 범위

trans-unit.source: The element to give logical focus to.
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스를 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> as a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> 포커스 범위로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위는 컨테이너 요소를 추적 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>해당 범위 내에서.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Window>클래스는 마찬가지로 포커스 범위는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위를 요소에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>로 설정 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 논리 포커스 포커스와 키보드 포커스, 자세한 내용은 참조는 [입력 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The element to make a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 범위를 만들 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if `element` is a focus scope; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 `element` 포커스 범위, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
